amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the Federal unemployment surtax.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 135 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 135 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S1219; text: CR S1219) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the Federal unemployment surtax.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 135 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 100.
